thread.title: Olivia Palermo's Super Bowl Look Is Giving Us Game Day Style Goals
thread.title_full: Olivia Palermo's Super Bowl Look Is Giving Us Game Day Style Goals

title: Olivia Palermo's Super Bowl Look Is Giving Us Game Day Style Goals
text:
by Dacy Knight 
We've never doubted that Olivia Palermo can pull off the perfect look for any occasion. So when it comes to game day dressing , consider us unsurprised that the style star brought her A-game. In a photo just posted to Instagram where she's posing with husband Johannes Huebl, Palermo shows off her Super Bowl Sunday style —a navy jacket with zipper detailing worn off the shoulder and paired with matching lamé leggings and white sneakers. While the sporty look is a definite departure from her typically polished look, Palermo is no stranger to dressing down (while still keeping her outfit looking effortlessly elevated). Her all-blue ensemble has us thinking she's rooting for the Patriots, but more importantly, has us taking notes for our own Super Bowl stylings. 
Keep scrolling to see Olivia Palermo's game day look. PHOTO:
